problems.title: Check if a Word Occurs as a Prefix of Any Word in a Sentence (String Algorithm)
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given a sentence that consists of some words separated by a single space, and a searchWord, check if searchWord is a prefix of any word in sentence.
Return the index of the word in sentence (1-indexed) where searchWord is a prefix of this word. If searchWord is a prefix of more than one word, return the index of the first word (minimum index). If there is no such word return -1.
A prefix of a string s is any leading contiguous substring of s.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
i love eating burger
burg

Sample Output
4

Explanation: "burg" is prefix of "burger" which is the 4th word in the sentence.

Sample Input
this problem is an easy problem
pro

Sample Output
2

Explanation: "pro" is prefix of "problem" which is the 2nd and the 6th word in the sentence, but we return 2 as it's the minimal index.
problems.constraints:
1 <= sentence.length <= 100
1 <= searchWord.length <= 10
sentence consists of lowercase English letters and spaces.
searchWord consists of lowercase English letters.

testCases.input:
this problem is an easy problem
pro

hintsList: Check if searchWord is a prefix of each word using string comparison.
